import sys
import math
from queue import Queue
import heapq

def main(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    if n & 1:
        print('NO')
        return
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        opposite = (i + n // 2) % n
        if arr[opposite] == -1 and arr[i] == -1:
            arr[opposite] = arr[i] = 1
        elif arr[opposite] == -1:
            arr[opposite] = arr[i]
        elif arr[i] == -1:
            arr[i] = arr[opposite]
        if arr[i] != arr[opposite]:
            print('NO')
            return
    print('YES')
    print(*arr)
    return
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    main(arr)
